params.name: asset
params.description: Asset contents to use in Base64.

params.name: type
params.description: Media type to use in link. Default: `"text/plain"`.

importer.generateLink.shortDescription: Generate link from asset data with media type.

params.name: asset
params.description: Asset contents to use in Base64.

params.name: type
params.description: Media type to use in link. Default: `"text/css"`.

params.name: relation
params.description: Relation to use (`rel` attribute in HTML). Default: `"stylesheet"`.

importer.generateLinkDOMTag.shortDescription: Generate `link` DOM element from asset data with media type and relation.
